channel.title: [EDIT] Anims for npc
channel.description:
Im realy realy realy realy stuck a added ins for bandos *real one* walk anim is 7058 that one is good like
old npc was dasim that one from dt but if i search the anim 7058 in server every file with z-filesearcher i cant find it so plzzzzzzzz help me im realy stuck!!! :confused:
More info
Npc ID = 1974
Attack Emote = 7060 Block Emote = 7061 Die Emote = 7062 Range Attack Emote = 7063
Can mabye somebody make a code of it and tell me where to put those codes to let my bandos use those emotes

i added those emotes to my client…
but i try to find how i do it in my server but cant even find the current att anim of the monster and i know the anim…

item.title: [EDIT] Anims for npc
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

I’m no expert with adding animations or anything like that, but it does sound that you need to add it to your client/server. I am sure enough that there is a tutorial on this website or another about how to do so, you’ll just have to make use of google or the search feature.

Read full topic
